author: Dufour, Richard and Damnati, Géraldine and Charlet, Delphine
title: Détection et caractérisation des régions d'erreurs dans des transcriptions de contenus multimédia : application à la recherche des noms de personnes (Error region detection and characterization in transcriptions of multimedia documents : application to person name search) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 1: JEP
